verses.verse: Now after<WH310> the death<WH4194> of Joshua<WH3091> it came to pass<WH1121>, that the sons of Israel<WH3478> asked<WH7592> the Lord<WH3068>, saying<WH559>, Who shall go up<WH5927> for us against the Canaanites<WH3669> first<WH8462>, to fight against them<WH3898>?
And the Lord<WH3068> said<WH559>, Judah<WH3063> shall go up<WH5927>: behold<WH5414>, I have delivered the land<WH776> into his hand<WH3027>.

And Judah<WH3063> said<WH559> unto Simeon<WH8095> his brother<WH251>, Come up<WH5927> with me into my lot<WH1486>, that we may fight<WH3898> against the Canaanites<WH3669>; and I likewise will go<WH1980> with you into your lot<WH1486>. So Simeon<WH8095> went with him<WH3212>.

And Judah<WH3063> went up<WH5927>; and the Lord<WH3068> delivered<WH5414> the Canaanites<WH3669> and the Perizzites<WH6522> into their hand<WH3027>: and they killed<WH5221> of them in Bezek<WH966> ten<WH6235> thousand<WH505> men<WH376>.
And they found<WH4672> Adoni<WH137>–bezek in Bezek<WH966>: and they fought<WH3898> against him<WH5221>, and they killed the Canaanites<WH3669> and the Perizzites<WH6522>.
But Adoni<WH137>–bezek fled<WH5127>; and they pursued<WH7291> after<WH310> him<WH270>, and caught him<WH7112>, and cut off his thumbs<WH931> and his great toes<WH7272>.

And Adoni<WH137>–bezek said<WH559>, Sixty and ten<WH7657> kings<WH4428>, having their thumbs<WH931> and their great toes<WH7272> cut off<WH7112>, gathered<WH3950> their food under my table<WH7979>: as I have done<WH6213>, so God<WH430> has requited<WH7999> me<WH935>. And they brought him to Jerusalem<WH3389>, and there he died<WH4191>.

Now the sons<WH1121> of Judah<WH3063> had fought<WH3898> against Jerusalem<WH3389>, and had taken<WH3920> it<WH5221>, and struck it with the edge<WH6310> of the sword<WH2719>, and set<WH7971> the city<WH5892> on fire<WH784>.

And afterward<WH310> the sons<WH1121> of Judah<WH3063> went down<WH3381> to fight<WH3898> against the Canaanites<WH3669>, that lived<WH3427> in the mountain<WH2022>, and in the south<WH5045>, and in the valley<WH8219>.

And Judah<WH3063> went<WH3212> against the Canaanites<WH3669> that lived<WH3427> in Hebron<WH2275>: (now the name<WH8034> of Hebron<WH2275> before<WH6440> was Kirjath<WH7153>–arba:) and they killed<WH5221> Sheshai<WH8344>, and Ahiman<WH289>, and Talmai<WH8526>.
And from there he went<WH3212> against the inhabitants<WH3427> of Debir<WH1688>: and the name<WH8034> of Debir<WH1688> before<WH6440> was Kirjath<WH7158>–sepher:
And Caleb<WH3612> said<WH559>, He that strikes<WH5221> Kirjath<WH7158>–sepher, and takes<WH3920> it<WH5414>, to him will I give Achsah<WH5915> my daughter<WH1323> to wife<WH802>.
And Othniel<WH6274> the son<WH1121> of Kenaz<WH7073>, Caleb<WH3612>'s younger<WH6996> brother<WH251>, took<WH3920> it<WH5414>: and he gave him Achsah<WH5915> his daughter<WH1323> to wife<WH802>.

And it came to pass<WH935>, when she came to him<WH5496>, that she moved him to ask<WH7592> of her father<WH1> a field<WH7704>: and she lighted<WH6795> from off her donkey<WH2543>; and Caleb<WH3612> said unto her<WH559>, What will you?

And she said<WH559> unto him<WH3051>, Give me a blessing<WH1293>: for you have given<WH5414> me a south<WH5045> land<WH776>; give<WH5414> me also springs<WH1543> of water<WH4325>. And Caleb<WH3612> gave<WH5414> her the upper<WH5942> springs<WH1543> and the lower<WH8482> springs<WH1543>.

And the sons<WH1121> of the Kenite<WH7017>, Moses<WH4872>' father in law<WH2859>, went up<WH5927> out of the city<WH5892> of palm trees<WH8558> with the sons<WH1121> of Judah<WH3063> into the wilderness<WH4057> of Judah<WH3063>, which lies in the south<WH5045> of Arad<WH6166>; and they went<WH3212> and lived<WH3427> among<WH854> the people<WH5971>.

And Judah<WH3063> went<WH3212> with Simeon<WH8095> his brother<WH251>, and they killed<WH5221> the Canaanites<WH3669> that inhabited<WH3427> Zephath<WH6857>, and utterly destroyed<WH2763> it<WH8034>. And the name of the city<WH5892> was called<WH7121> Hormah<WH2767>.
Also Judah<WH3063> took<WH3920> Gaza<WH5804> with the coast<WH1366> there<WH831>, and Askelon with the coast<WH1366> there<WH6138>, and Ekron with the coast there<WH1366>.

And the Lord<WH3068> was with Judah<WH3063>; and he drove out<WH3423> the inhabitants of the mountain<WH2022>; but could not<WH3808> drive out<WH3423> the inhabitants<WH3427> of the valley<WH6010>, because they had chariots<WH7393> of iron<WH1270>.
And they gave<WH5414> Hebron<WH2275> unto Caleb<WH3612>, as Moses<WH4872> said<WH1696>: and he expelled<WH3423> there the three<WH7969> sons<WH1121> of Anak<WH6061>.

And the sons<WH1121> of Benjamin<WH1144> did not drive out<WH3423> the Jebusites<WH2983> that inhabited<WH3427> Jerusalem<WH3389>; but the Jebusites<WH2983> live<WH3427> with the sons<WH1121> of Benjamin<WH1144> in Jerusalem<WH3389> unto this day<WH3117>.
And the house<WH1004> of Joseph<WH3130>, they also went up<WH5927> against Beth<WH1008>–el: and the Lord was with them<WH3068>.
And the house<WH1004> of Joseph<WH3130> sent to spy<WH8446> Beth<WH1008>–el. (Now the name<WH8034> of the city<WH5892> before<WH6440> was Luz<WH3870>.)

And the spies<WH8104> saw<WH7200> a man<WH376> come forth<WH3318> out of the city<WH5892>, and they said<WH559> unto him<WH7200>, Show us<WH3996>, we pray you, the entrance into the city<WH5892>, and we will show<WH6213> you mercy<WH2617>.

And when he showed<WH7200> them the entrance<WH3996> into the city<WH5892>, they struck<WH5221> the city<WH5892> with the edge<WH6310> of the sword<WH2719>; but they let go<WH7971> the man<WH376> and all his family<WH4940>.

And the man<WH376> went<WH3212> into the land<WH776> of the Hittites<WH2850>, and built<WH1129> a city<WH5892>, and called<WH7121> the name<WH8034> there Luz<WH3870>: which is the name<WH8034> there unto this day<WH3117>.

Neither did Manasseh<WH4519> drive out<WH3423> the inhabitants of Beth<WH1052>–shean and her towns<WH1323>, nor Taanach<WH8590> and her towns<WH1323>, nor the inhabitants<WH3427> of Dor<WH1756> and her towns<WH1323>, nor the inhabitants<WH3427> of Ibleam<WH2991> and her towns<WH1323>, nor the inhabitants<WH3427> of Megiddo<WH4023> and her towns<WH1323>: but the Canaanites<WH3669> would<WH2974> live<WH3427> in that land<WH776>.
And it came to pass<WH3478>, when Israel was strong<WH2388>, that they put<WH7760> the Canaanites<WH3669> to tribute<WH4522>, and did not utterly<WH3423> drive them out<WH3423>.
Neither did Ephraim<WH669> drive out<WH3423> the Canaanites<WH3669> that lived<WH3427> in Gezer<WH1507>; but the Canaanites<WH3669> lived<WH3427> in Gezer<WH1507> among them<WH7130>.

Neither did Zebulun<WH2074> drive out<WH3423> the inhabitants<WH3427> of Kitron<WH7003>, nor the inhabitants<WH3427> of Nahalol<WH5096>; but the Canaanites<WH3669> lived<WH3427> among<WH7130> them<WH4522>, and became tributaries.

Neither did Asher<WH836> drive out<WH3423> the inhabitants<WH3427> of Accho<WH5910>, nor the inhabitants<WH3427> of Zidon<WH6721>, nor of Ahlab<WH303>, nor of Achzib<WH392>, nor of Helbah<WH2462>, nor of Aphik<WH663>, nor of Rehob<WH7340>:
But the Asherites<WH843> lived<WH3427> among<WH7130> the Canaanites<WH3669>, the inhabitants<WH3427> of the land<WH776>: for they did not drive them out<WH3423>.

Neither did Naphtali<WH5321> drive out<WH3423> the inhabitants<WH3427> of Beth<WH1053>–shemesh, nor the inhabitants<WH3427> of Beth<WH1043>–anath; but he lived<WH3427> among<WH7130> the Canaanites<WH3669>, the inhabitants<WH3427> of the land<WH776>: nevertheless the inhabitants<WH3427> of Beth<WH1053>–shemesh and of Beth<WH1043>–anath became tributaries unto them<WH4522>.
And the Amorites<WH567> forced<WH3905> the sons<WH1121> of Dan<WH1835> into the mountain<WH2022>: for they would not allow<WH5414> them to come down<WH3381> to the valley<WH6010>:

But the Amorites<WH567> would<WH2974> live<WH3427> in mountain<WH2022> Heres<WH2776> in Aijalon<WH357>, and in Shaalbim<WH8169>: yet the hand<WH3027> of the house<WH1004> of Joseph<WH3130> prevailed<WH3513>, so that they became tributaries<WH4522>.
And the coast<WH1366> of the Amorites<WH567> was from the going up<WH4608> to Akrabbim<WH4610>, from the rock<WH5553>, and upward<WH4605>.
